Dell iDrac SNMPV2

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


Dell idrac

Overview

这是https://share.zabbix.com/network_devices/cat-dell-sonicwall/dell-idrac的中文化版本，同时进行了修正以支持zabbix3.0，感谢原作者

Macros used

|Name|Description|Default|Type| |—-|———–|——-|—-| |{$SNMP_COMMUNITY}|<p>-</p>|public|Text macro|

Template links

There are no template links in this template.

Name Description Expression Priority
物理机 {HOSTNAME} 风扇 {#FAN} 异常 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Dell iDrac SNMPV2:FanStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> average
物理机{HOST.NAME} 内存 {#MEM} 错误 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Dell iDrac SNMPV2:MemStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
物理机 {#HOSTNAME} 网卡 {#NETIF} 状态变化 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Dell iDrac SNMPV2:NetConnStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].diff(0)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning

物理机 {HOST.NAME} 电源 {#POWER} 状态异常 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Dell iDrac SNMPV2:PowerSupplySensorState.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
物理机 {HOST.NAME} 处理器 {#SNMPINDEX} 状态异常 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: ({Dell iDrac SNMPV2:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>3 and {Dell iDrac SNMPV2:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}<>2) or ({Dell iDrac SNMPV2:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(86400)}<>2 and {Dell iDrac SNMPV2:ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].last(0)}=2)</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high

Dell idrac

Overview

这是https://share.zabbix.com/network_devices/cat-dell-sonicwall/dell-idrac的中文化版本，同时进行了修正以支持zabbix3.0，感谢原作者

Name Description Expression Priority
物理机 {HOSTNAME} 风扇 {#FAN} 异常 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/FanStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}])<>3</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> average
物理机{HOST.NAME} 内存 {#MEM} 错误 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/MemStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}])<>3</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
物理机 {#HOSTNAME} 网卡 {#NETIF} 状态变化 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: (last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/NetConnStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}],#1)<>last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/NetConnStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}],#2))=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> warning
物理机{HOST.NAME} 网卡 {#NETIF} 状态异常 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/NetStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}])<>3</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
物理机 {HOST.NAME} 电源 {#POWER} 状态异常 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/PowerSupplySensorState.[{#SNMPINDEX}])<>1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
物理机 {HOST.NAME} 处理器 {#SNMPINDEX} 状态异常 <p>-</p> <p>Expression: (last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}])<>3 and last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}])<>2) or (last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}])<>2 and last(/Dell iDrac SNMPV2/ProcStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}])=2)</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
